content.title: Root Font Size
content.tooltip: The root font size for the document. Typically 62.5% or 100%.
The size of your H4 heading. All other heading sizes are calculated from this value.
The degree of difference between heading sizes (up/down keys cycle through music scales).

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your heading font-family output.

content.title: Heading Color
content.tooltip: The default color of your headings.

content.title: Line Height
content.tooltip: The space between heading lines.

content.title: Font Weight
content.tooltip: The weight (boldness) of your headings.

content.title: Letter Spacing
content.tooltip: The space between characters in your headings.

content.title: Max-Width
content.tooltip: The width at which line breaks will occur in your headings.

content.title: Font Style
content.tooltip: The font style of your headings (italic, oblique, etc.).

content.title: Text Transform
content.tooltip: The case of your headings (uppercase, lowercase, etc.).

content.title: Text Wrap
content.tooltip: The wrapping behavior of your headings ('wrap' = normal)

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h1 font-family output.

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h2 font-family output.

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h3 font-family output.

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h4 font-family output.

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h5 font-family output.

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your h6 font-family output.
The size of your 'M' & default text. All other text sizes are calculated from this value.
The degree of difference between text sizes (up/down keys cycle through music scales).

content.title: Font Family
content.tooltip: Set your heading font-family output.

content.title: Default Text Color
content.tooltip: The default color of your text.

content.title: Default Line Height
content.tooltip: The space between lines of text.

content.title: Font Weight
content.tooltip: The weight (boldness) of your text.

content.title: Letter Spacing
content.tooltip: The space between characters in your text.

content.title: Max-Width
content.tooltip: The width at which line breaks will occur in your paragraphs.

content.title: Font Style
content.tooltip: The font style of your text (italic, oblique, etc.).

content.title: Text Transform
content.tooltip: The case of your text (uppercase, lowercase, etc.).

content.title: Text Wrap
content.tooltip: The wrapping behavior of your text ('wrap' = normal)
